info.title: QuestionSender Mobile Api
info.description: A sample application with current Framework, Swagger, Swashbuckle, and API versioning.

DefaultQuestionDto.description: This object can be used to show model peroperties and relational properties of DefaultQuestion

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
